title: Coto's Captive
description: *** THIS BOOK WAS PREVIOUSLY PUBLISHED AS PART OF AN ANTHOLOGY *** Lynn is tracking a dangerous, wounded animal, which turns out to be a big, sexy alien instead. And he’s the hottest guy she’s ever met.  Coto’s trip to Earth takes a dangerous turn. He is attacked and injured. The only high point is the courageous woman who tends his wounds. Coto desires her and he will never let her go.
author: Laurann Dohner
